name: InclusionGuide
0:
”Alexa, open inclusion guide”
”Alexa, ask inclusion guide to tell me the tip of the week”
”Alexa, ask inclusion guide how I can be more inclusive”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: inclusion guide
des: Use this skill to sharpen your inclusive habits. Inclusive culture starts with mindfulness. We hope that by listening to these tips about inclusion, you are able to recognize some of the problematic tendencies in your own workplace culture and help contribute to change. However small it may seem, a simple gesture of inclusivity can make a big difference for someone else.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
